name: Falling Gems
description:
Falling Gems is an insanely addictive puzzle game with three breathtaking game modes filled with gems to be unlocked, combos, shining stars and multiple levels of ever-increasing difficulty!

The rules are simple: swap adjacent gems to make sets of three or more gems of the same color. Straight line, L-shaped and other forms are all valid!

• Run against time in the Challenge and Classic modes, or relax with the Endless mode!
• Intuitive gameplay: just swipe your finger to swap gems!
• Rotate your device to make gems fall in different directions!
• Color-blind mode!
• No ads!
